name: labs.katas
description: individual training exercises in programming and other software crafts
author: Dan Dohotaru

scripts.bundle:dev: npm run clean && set NODE_ENV=development && webpack --progress
scripts.bundle:prod: npm run clean && set NODE_ENV=production && webpack --progress
scripts.serve:dev: npm run clean && set NODE_ENV=development && webpack-dev-server --inline
scripts.serve:prod: npm run clean && set NODE_ENV=production && webpack-dev-server --inline
